Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Robin Lopez?

Robin Lopez is 37 years old.

Where was Robin Lopez born?

Robin Lopez was born in North Hollywood, California.

When was Robin Lopez born?

Robin Lopez was born on April 1, 1988.

How tall is Robin Lopez?

Robin Lopez is 7-1 (216 cm) tall.

How much did Robin Lopez weigh when playing?

Robin Lopez weighed 281 lbs (127 kg) when playing.

Is Robin Lopez in the Hall of Fame?

Robin Lopez is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was Robin Lopez drafted?

Robin Lopez was drafted by Phoenix Suns, 1st round (15th pick, 15th overall), 2008 NBA Draft.

What position did Robin Lopez play?

Center.

When did Robin Lopez retire?

Robin Lopez last played in 2024.

What is Robin Lopez's net worth?

Robin Lopez made at least $100,315,740 playing professional basketball.

How much did Robin Lopez make?

Robin Lopez made $14,357,750 in 2019.

What did Robin Lopez average?

Robin Lopez averaged 8.4 points, 4.7 rebounds, and 0.8 assists per game.

How many rings does Robin Lopez have?

Robin Lopez won 0 championships.

What is Robin Lopez's Instagram account?

Robin Lopez is on Instagram at gustogummi88.

What schools did Robin Lopez attend?

Robin Lopez attended San Joaquin Memorial in Fresno, California and Stanford.

What are Robin Lopez's nicknames?

RoLo is a nickname for Robin Lopez.
